title: Win It Weekly: A pair of Vittoria Corsa TLR tires and air-liner tubeless road kit
content:
How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a pair of Vittoria Corsa TLRs tires and an air-liner tubeless road kit.

Prize:

  • One pair of Vittoria Corsa TLR 700x28c tires
  • Vittoria Air-Liner Tubeless Road Kit
  • MSRP US$270.00

Prize Details:

The Vittoria Air-Liner Road kit is the all-in-one package for the best experience on your tubeless tires, containing two Air-Liner Road inserts, one bottle of Universal Tubeless Tire Sealant, and the Road Tubeless Took-kit plier and clips for easy tubeless tire removal. The Air-Liner Road increases the safety of tubeless-ready tires by locking the bead of the tire into the rim, reducing the likelihood of burping at the bead. It also cushions the tire and wheel from impacts and provides an additional tubeless set-up seal.
author: CyclingTips
